#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int table[1000020];
int main()
{
    int t,n,i;
    for(i=0;i<1000020;i++)
        table[i]=-1;
    table[6]=0;
    table[8]=1;
    for(i=6;i<1000002;i++)
    {
        if(table[i]==-1)
            continue;
        if(table[i]==1)
        {
            table[i+6]=table[i+8]=1;
        }
        else
        {
            if(table[i+6]==-1)
            table[i+6]=0;
            table[i+8]=1;
        }
    }
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        //cout<<table[n]<<"\n";
        if(table[n]==-1)
            cout<<"RIDICULOUS\n";
        else if(table[n]==1)
            cout<<"YES\n";
        else
            cout<<"NO\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
